body.description: ULTRA-SAFE BABY LAUNDRY DETERGENT Highly effective product that helps protect fabric integrity. Safe and gentle for baby's delicate skin. Safe means no sulfates, dyes, formaldehyde, phosphates, phthalates, optical brighteners, or 1.4-dioxane. INGREDIENTS water, plant-based cleaners (decyl glucoside, glycerin, sodium oleate, lauryl glucoside), mineral-based water softener (sodium carbonate), plant-based water softener (sodium gluconate), plant-derived soil remover (carboxymethyl cellulose), enzyme soil removers (protease, alpha-amylase), fragrance Developed for both high efficiency (HE) and conventional washing machines. Plant-based Hypoallergenic Pediatrician-tested Dermatologist-test Cruelty-free Made in USA

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BABY HOME & LAUNDRY ESSENTIALS BY NOODLE & BOO Baby Laundry Essentials... because everything that touches baby’s skin matters. Our Ultra Care line is safe and gentle for baby’s delicate skin. Safe means no sulfates, dyes, phthalates, formaldehyde, phosphates, 1.4-dioxane, or optical brighteners. Noodle & Boo products are made with natural ingredients and aim to pursue sustainability. Plant-based formulas.Non-toxic. Clinically-tested for sensitive skin and hypoallergenic. Made in the USA. Tested by Noodle & Boo, LLC (3rd party testing on file)

Plant-based formula with strong stain-fighting enzymes naturally removes stains and odors. LAUNDRY DETERGENT AND FABRIC CONDITIONER SET Bundle includes Ultra-Safe Laundry Detergent and Ultra-Soft Fabric Conditioner.Highly concentrated (32 washes).Highly effective products that help protect fabric integrity.Created without dyes, formaldehyde, phosphates, phthalates or 1.4-dioxane.Signature N&B Crème Douce Scent. Tested by Noodle & Boo, LLC (3rd party testing on file) ULTRA-SAFE BABY LAUNDRY DETERGENT Highly effective product that helps protect fabric integrity. Safe and gentle for baby's delicate skin. Safe means no sulfates, dyes, formaldehyde, phosphates, phthalates, optical brighteners, or 1.4-dioxane. INGREDIENTS water, plant-based cleaners (decyl glucoside, glycerin, sodium oleate, lauryl glucoside), mineral-based water softener (sodium carbonate), plant-based water softener (sodium gluconate), plant-derived soil remover (carboxymethyl cellulose), enzyme soil removers (protease, alpha-amylase), fragrance Developed for both high efficiency (HE) and conventional washing machines. Plant-based Hypoallergenic Pediatrician-tested Dermatologist-test Cruelty-free Made in USA

ULTIMATE BABY FABRIC CARE ULTRA-SOFT BABY FABRIC CONDITIONER Mild formula with naturally-derived softening oils, infuses cuddly goodness into every load.Developed to decrease drying time, reduce wrinkles and eliminate static cling.Created without dyes, formaldehyde, phosphates, phthalates or 1.4-dioxane.Highly Concentrated (32 washes). INGREDIENTS water, naturally-derived softening oils, mineral-based cleaning enhancers, fragrance ULTRA-STRONG STAIN REMOVER Plant-based technology removes tough stains and odors while preserving the fabric integrity of baby’s dainties.Innovative solution contains no chlorine, dyes, formaldehyde, phosphates, or phthalates.Developed especially for kinder use. Fragrance-free. INGREDIENTS plant-derived surfactant (alcohol ethoxylate), plant-derived chelating agent (gluconic acid), preservative/antifungal agent (sodium benzoate), plant-derived soil remover (carboxymethyl cellulose) ULTRA-BRIGHT BLEACH ALTERNATIVE Safely clean baby’s precious environment; high-chair, car seat, stroller, toys; even the floor!The incredible power of oxygen can quickly and safely remove most organic stains.A perfect chlorine bleach alternative; nothing but goodness!This simple, fragrance-free formula has no chlorine, dyes, sulfates, formaldehyde, phosphates, phthalates, parabens, or 1.4-dioxane.Highly concentrated (32 washes). INGREDIENTS mineral-based brightener (sodium chloride), chlorine-free oxygen bleach (sodium percarbonate) ULTRA-FRESH BABY LINEN MIST Ideal for baby’s freshly ironed linens.Refresh hard-to-wash items like comforters and pillows.Deodorize car seats, strollers, and diaper pails with our Signature Crème Douce scent.A perfect way to add a delightful scent, while removing odor.No artificial color or harmful ingredients; you can feel good about spraying it in the baby’s environment.Always test on fabric and furnishings prior to use. INGREDIENTS water, denatured ethanol, citric acid, sodium citrate, benzophenone-4, gluconic acid, sodium benzoate, fragrance

Ultra-Safe Baby Laundry Detergent Ultra-Soft Baby Fabric Conditioner Ultra-Strong Stain Remover Ultra-Bright Bleach Alternative Ultra-Fresh Baby Linen Mist No. of Loads 32 Loads 32 Loads n/a 32 Loads n/a For Sensitive Skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-toxic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Ultra-Safe Baby Laundry Detergent Ultra-Safe Baby Laundry Detergent No. of Loads 6 Loads 44 Loads For Sensitive Skin ✓ ✓ Non-toxic ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell, love the way my clothes feel
reviews.reviewText: We have a two year old so I always look to buy products that are safe for her. This stuff smells great and works well too. We weren’t using fabric softener for a little while and our clothes just started to feel stiff. Also a bonus, smells great but not too strong or “baby” smelling. My husband approves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In love with this scent and glad they have this fabric softener for my baby's clothes! I also own the detergent and both together work very well, not only for the scent but cleans good too. My baby deals with sensitive skin and was a little worried at first but luckily this has not causedany skin outbreaks/sensitivity. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Smell
reviews.reviewText: I love this fabric softener and laundry detergent for my baby clothes, smells great and isn't full of harmful chemicals! It is definitely on the pricey side but I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won’t stop washing your clothes!
reviews.reviewText: I’m addicted to the smell of this fabric softener. Makes all of my clothes linens soft abs fragrant. I’ve repurchased many times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light scent, seems to work well
reviews.reviewText: Just finished my first bottle of this fabric softener and I will be purchasing again. Been using on baby clothes as well as regular household laundry since I switched to washing everything now in the baby safe laundry supplies. Light scent, definitely a ‘baby laundry’ scent but it smells nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product! I deducted a star because the way the bottle dispenses it’s terrible… it always spills a little

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my son’s signature scent and we get so many compliments. Soft and subtle
